Name: Hotel Carmichael, Autograph Collection
Description: Genteel hotel along the Monon Trail with a French restaurant, a bar & a live entertainment venue.

Name: Ironworks Hotel Indy
Description: Industrial-chic quarters in a trendy hotel offering 3 restaurant/bars, plus a gym & free parking.

Name: Sybaris Indianapolis
Description: Luxe lodging offering refined suites with private pools, steam rooms & fireplaces, plus free Wi-Fi.

Name: TownePlace Suites Indianapolis Park 100
Description: Casual studios & suites in a straightforward hotel offering a fitness room, plus free breakfast.

Name: Renaissance Indianapolis North Hotel
Description: Sophisticated property with American dining, plus an indoor pool & a fitness center.

Name: Hotel Broad Ripple
Description: Relaxed hotel with airy, individually decorated rooms, some with balconies, plus a bar/lounge.

Name: TownePlace Suites Indianapolis Keystone
Description: Unassuming all-suite hotel offering an exercise room & an outdoor pool, plus free breakfast & Wi-Fi.

Name: Courtyard Indianapolis Northwest
Description: Straightforward hotel with contemporary rooms & a patio fire pit, plus an indoor pool & free WiFi.

Name: Red Roof Inn Indianapolis - Castleton
Description: Warm, down-to-earth rooms in a budget hotel offering complimentary parking & Wi-Fi.

Name: Fairfield Inn & Suites Indianapolis Northwest
Description: Simple hotel with an indoor pool & fitness facilities, plus free Wi-Fi & hot breakfast.

Name: Courtyard Indianapolis Fishers
Description: Streamlined rooms & suites in a relaxed hotel featuring a bistro, a fitness center & an indoor pool.

Name: Red Roof Inn Indianapolis North - College Park
Description: Straightforward budget hotel offering colorful rooms, plus complimentary Wi-Fi & parking.
